Dialogue.Page: We borrowed your ship while you were sleeping, hatchling. Hope you don't mind.
Don't worry! Slate is keeping an eye on it at the <color=orange>north pole camp</color>.
The ship you're in now was made out of old mining equipment back on Timber Hearth. I have no idea how Slate made this thing fly.
Anyway, the others are probably waiting on you. The camp is just a <color=orange>quick spacewalk</color> away!
